description: This is a JavaScript source file defining a React-like component called 'Quiz' for a quiz application frontend using LightningJS. It includes component definitions, templates, computed properties, lifecycle hooks, methods, and user input handlers for the quiz interface.

classes.name: Quiz
classes.description: A LightningJS component representing the quiz interface, managing questions, user interactions, and UI state.

methods.name: evaluateSelection
methods.description: Evaluates whether the selected answer is correct, updates feedback state accordingly.

methods.name: persistScore
methods.description: Stores the current quiz score in localStorage.

methods.name: resetScore
methods.description: Resets the quiz score in localStorage to zero.

methods.name: navigateNext
methods.description: Advances to the next question or navigates to the results page upon quiz completion.
